0: My girlfriend was happy with the pics she saw i on the other hand was not When i m in a five star hotel i expect NOT JUST 5 star lobbies i do nt sleep in the lobby i sleep in the room the furniture looked like a holiday inn
I had three separate check ins on this trip
Having to stay for three weeks at a hotel for business trip I honestly was nervous about many things language halal food culture differences in daily basis
May be not the best memory of trip
I did not want to leave the Four Seasons this was definitely my nice hotel of the trip
It reminded me of an old Holiday Inn
In this hotel if you ask for something once they remember for your next trip and they ask YOU if you want need it

Regrettably then after arriving at the airport our flight was cancelled without notice so our group of fourteen Australians found ourselves stranded at Shanghai airport with no Plan B and no accommodation booked
Eventhough I was on a business trip my stay in the Four Seasons hotel Shanghai gave me the feeling of a second home
1: Overall we had a very nice experience and would definitely recommend to friends and family
Stayed here for 1 night on a business trip and look forward to staying again
Enjoyed our three night stay with tour group
stayed there for business before and this time for a leisure trip with friends again
Thanks to her I had the best trip
Took advantage of the Hotels stay 3 nites pay 2 special for a weekend trip
Stayed here 4 nights with club lounge access to visit family that live here
It was the perfect finish to an incredible trip
one of the best business trip spots in Shanghai
I will try to stay at this hotel in my future trips to Shanghai and will certainly try other Four Seasons because of this delightful experience
